TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable/HtmlTableRowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are the rows of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 클래스의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다 에 대 한 개체는 제어 합니다.The class represents a collection of objects for an control. 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 끝에 추가할 수 있습니다는 메서드를 사용 하 여 컬렉션의 지정한 인덱스 위치에 또는 메서드.Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the method. 형식의 컨트롤만 에 추가할 수는 컬렉션입니다.Only controls of type can be added to the collection. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에는 사용자 지정을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다 재정의 하는 메서드 행 테이블에 추가 될 때, 되도록 항상 테이블의 행 컬렉션의 시작 부분에 추가 됩니다.The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (child As Control)

span.span: The to add to the collection.
Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 추가 된 컨트롤은만 될 수 있습니다는 컨트롤 그렇지는 예외가 throw 됩니다.The added control can only be an control; otherwise, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에는 사용자 지정을 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다 를 재정의 하는 컬렉션의 메서드 행 테이블에 추가 될 때, 되도록 항상 테이블의 행 컬렉션의 시작 부분에 추가 됩니다.The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom collection that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. 알림 방법을 사용자 지정 기본 클래스의 메서드를 호출 사용 하 여 메서드는 `index` 매개 변수를 0입니다.Notice how the custom method calls the base class's method with the `index` parameter equal to 0. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

span.span: The added control must be of type .

span.span: The new control is added to the array at the specified index location.
